text: Uncle Sam and His Battering Ram is a World War I song written by Robert P. Hall and composed by Ida K. Mervine. The song was first published in 1918 by Mervine & Hall Music in Phoenix, AZ. The sheet music cover features Uncle Sam pointing to the Kaiser as a ram butts him in the stomach. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library.Mervine, Ida K., and Robert P. Hall. 1918.
